cipher.model

Class AlexCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • cipher.model.AlexCipher

  • public class AlexCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    This simple Cipher shows how a LS can be used to crypt and decrypt information. The mechanism is due to Gibson, and it's called "Off the Grid".
    Author:
    igallego
